1.default_message: Try again. If you are not sure what to look for, check out the help for more information.

messages.yes: Well done! There is a possible built cultural heritage site in this photo.
messages.no: Try again. Are you sure there is no built cultural heritage in this photo? Check out the help for information on what you should be looking for.

2.default_message: This photo was taken in Sana'a, Yemen. Look at the help for tips on how to identify a site using Google searches

messages.Sana'a: Correct! This is a photo of the city of Sana'a in Yemen.

3.default_message: Sana'a has a Wikipedia page here: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sana%27a. Check out the help for tips on finding this page.

messages.https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sana%27a: Well done! This is the wikipedia page for Sana'a

4.default_message: Try again. If you are not sure what to look for, check out the help for more information.

messages.yes: Correct! This part of the city of Sana'a has been damaged by an explosion. You can read more about what happened in the image source.
messages.no: Hmmm, are you sure? Check out the help for information on what you should be looking for.
